description: NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2002, defines the format and content of the electronic file set that comprises a digital talking book (DTB) and establishes a limited set of requirements for DTB playback devices.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.niso.org/workrooms/daisy/Z39-86-2002.html, http://www.loc.gov/nls/niso/dtd.htm, http://www.loc.gov/nls/z3986/v100/dtbook110doc.htm</field><field name="filenameExtension">opf, xml, ncx, aac, mp3, wav</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Digital Talking Book.  ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2002
